checks.name: Bounded-Loss Controls
checks.detail: Absolute no-loss guarantees are impossible in live markets; enforce strict bounded-loss controls. strict_profit_only=True, KILLED events=0
checks.remediation: Keep strict profit-only gating, kill-switches, and funded budget caps active at all times.

checks.name: Capital Protection (Kill Events)
checks.remediation: If >0, freeze budget escalation and root-cause failed HOT strategies.

checks.name: Active Profit Pipeline
checks.detail: Quant promoted WARM=0, Quant funded promoted=0, Pipeline promoted HOT=3725, Pipeline funded strategies=13
checks.remediation: Increase positive OOS candidates and keep only funded strategies with robust gate metrics.

checks.name: Live Profit Evidence
checks.remediation: Run WARM strategies through runtime gate and promote only if paper PnL remains positive over required window.

checks.name: Funded Diversification
checks.detail: Max funded pair budget share=47.52%, funded_per_pair={'BTC-USD': {'count': 4, 'budget_usd': 14.48}, 'ETH-USD': {'count': 4, 'budget_usd': 8.98}, 'LINK-USD': {'count': 1, 'budget_usd': 0.91}, 'SOL-USD': {'count': 4, 'budget_usd': 6.1}}, bootstrap_exception=False
checks.remediation: Enforce per-pair funded cap and total funded budget cap before granting new starter budget.

checks.name: Funded OOS Trade Evidence
checks.remediation: Throttle sparse-OOS funding and prefer strategies with observed OOS trade activity.
